strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to play audio in a Google Desktop Gadget

strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Audio Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget uses the audio framework to play an MP3 file. You can control the playback using the text control.
